about_the_game:
Mission: Diamond Back is a first-person adventure game. A security breach have occurred in one of Diamond Back's Research Units, the soldiers that have been sent are either dead or disappeared. As a last resort, a special trooper shall find the source and dangers caused by the breach.

  • Find clues of what happened
  • Overcome the obstacles that might occur
  • Survive the hostile environment




The features of the game include :



Different enemy types :
The security breach has brought mutations to the environment. Be aware of the small (or big) dangers surrounding you!




Weapons: use different weapon types to advance further into the mission.

content_descriptors.notes: The following game contains violence and/or bad language.

detailed_description:
Mission: Diamond Back is a first-person adventure game. A security breach have occurred in one of Diamond Back's Research Units, the soldiers that have been sent are either dead or disappeared. As a last resort, a special trooper shall find the source and dangers caused by the breach.

  • Find clues of what happened
  • Overcome the obstacles that might occur

The features of the game include :



Different enemy types :
The security breach has brought mutations to the environment. Be aware of the small (or big) dangers surrounding you!

name: Mission: Diamond Back

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 ( 64-bit )
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (4 core 2.7GHz) AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (4 core 3.5GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (4 GB) AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 ( 64-bit )
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 (6 core 3.7 GHz) AMD Ryzen 7 2700X (8 core 3.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super (8 GB) AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (12 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Mission : Diamond Back is a First-Person Shooter that follows the story of a security breach in one of DiamondBack's research units. In order to survive you must Search , Report and Kill.
